donations.donation_comment: Here's the $50 I sent to GoFundMe which they decided to refund back. Thank you Truckers and thank you GiveSendGo! God bless Canada and America.
Thank you Freedom Truckers from Michigan. Wish I could give more and that our own truckers were doing more to help you NOW. We need to end mandates everywhere. FREEDOM

Thank you Truckers! God bless you.  You have given me hope.   No  forced vaccinations,  no vaccine passports, no QR codes, no limits on our freedom to travel   or be with  family and friends.   We can get  our country back. Hold the line.

They just added an additional mandate here in BC. I'm taking some of Bonnie Henry's wine fund and putting it to better use than her day-drinking. In the interim, she hopefully sobers up and starts to think clearly and actually "follow the science." 

These bureaucrats are the real virus on society.

Honk. Honk.

Thank you very much Truckers! 
Many Canadians are not aware of having been losing their freedom and rights for years, especially these 2 years of pandemic, people are used to the social obedience to the governments/authorities. Plus MSMs became propaganda of authorities. As a Canadian originated from mainland China, I know  freedom is precious. Support truckers, fight with them for freedom!
Thank you truckers for demonstrating what peaceful protest looks like! Thank you for your bravery, commitment, and sacrifice! May God bless you all!!
